nerot
Class GenericTask

java.lang.Object
  nerot.BaseTask
      nerot.GenericTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
Storer, Task
public class GenericTask
extends BaseTask

A task that uses reflection to call an object generically and store the results in the Store.
